subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: David Lanzman and Michael Iavarone, two high-profile racing figures, are still engaged in a bitter fight over the morning-line favorite in last year’s Kentucky Derby.
snippet: David Lanzman and Michael Iavarone, two high-profile racing figures, are still engaged in a bitter fight over the morning-line favorite in last year’s Kentucky Derby.
